entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Kelowna
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 4:24 PM PST Saturday 24 December 2022

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow, -4.5°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Kelowna Airport 6:48 PM PST Saturday 24 December 2022
Condition: Light Snow
Temperature: -4.5°C
Pressure: 102.4 kPa
Visibility: 9.7 km
Humidity: 86 %
Wind Chill: -7
Dewpoint: -6.5°C
Wind: ESE 5 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 2

entry.title: Saturday night: Periods of snow. Temperature steady near minus 5.
entry.summary: Periods of snow ending near midnight then partly cloudy. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature steady near minus 5. Wind chill minus 12 this evening. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Saturday 24 December 2022

entry.title: Sunday: Snow. Temperature steady near minus 5.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Becoming cloudy near noon then snow. Amount 2 cm. Temperature steady near minus 5. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Saturday 24 December 2022

entry.title: Sunday night: Snow mixed with ice pellets. Temperature steady near minus 4.
entry.summary: Snow at times mixed with ice pellets. Risk of freezing rain overnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature steady near minus 4. Wind chill near minus 8. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Saturday 24 December 2022
